name: Amazing Trivia
description:
Amazing Trivia is a new game from the creator of True or False series. There are hundreds of questions based upon a range of subjects and topics.

What is the world's longest river? What does NASA stand for? What food makes up nearly all of a panda's diet? You will soon know the answer!

Have fun challenging yourself in Amazing Trivia!Key Features
  • All-new surprising and entertaining questions
  • Questions are split into different categories (Animals, History, People, Science, etc.)
  • Catchy and melodic soundtrack.
